text: Daniel Marcel Olbrychski (; born 27 February 1945) is a Polish actor. He is best known for leading roles in several Andrzej Wajda movies. He played a defector and spymaster Vassily Orlov, alongside Hollywood actress Angelina Jolie in the movie Salt. He also starred as Leo Jogiches in the 1986 movie Rosa Luxemburg. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Polish movie actors Category:Polish television actors Category:Polish stage actors Category:Polish voice actors Category:Living people
title: Daniel Olbrychski
